generalInfo:
Myanmar highlights tour is combined with not only experiencing uncommon culture and ethnicity but also digging the ancient histories by the exploring the archaeological sites of Myanmar. With friendly locals, a tropical climate, cheap transportation, and truly awesome sights, Myanmar becomes a fascinating and bewitching destination.

Yangon, the former capital of Myanmar is a thriving and bustling city and the most important commercial center of Myanmar. You can experience to see the Burmese architecture when you look at the Yangon city hall which features traditional roofs. Now, Yangon becomes the awe-inspiring city with good vibes.
Visiting Golden Rock, which is famous for delicately balancing on the edge of a cliff as well as being the third most important Buddhist pilgrimage site in Myanmar will give us an atmosphere of miracles with full of excitement. It would be our exciting time to take an open air truck ride up to the mountain and enjoy the full of wonder at the amazing sight of Golden Rock.

Visiting the glorious Bagan and the hidden villages near Bagan give us unforgettable memory in our life by exploring many impressive Myanmar stupas and forgotten the tradition of Burmese children far beyond.

Next stop is the royal capital Mandalay where you can learn the interesting history of Myanmar Dynasty. It will be of a great chance to see the authentic Burmese local handicrafts and workshops like the tapestry, wood carvings, gold leaf making etc.

Inle Lake, which is one of the remarkable destinations of Myanmar, will give you the different feeling from other destinations. Taking the boat along the Inle Lake to the charming small villages, observing the lifestyles and culture of Shan People, taking the photos of the activities of traditional unique leg-rowers will be a beautiful part of creating the best memories.

Ngwe Saung Beach is a serene coastal village in Myanmar known for its pristine beaches, clear blue waters, and stunning sunsets. You can enjoy water activities like snorkeling and kayaking, savor fresh seafood, and relax in beachfront while experiencing the local culture and tranquility of this picturesque destination.

As these 15 days, highlights of Myanmar is harmoniously composed of truly beautiful main areas and mixed with ancient and modern cities of Myanmar and a truly scenic trip to the fun sites are the best reasons to make this tour. Join Pro Niti Travel for the splendid experiences.
